author: metachris_
content: Wrote up our relay/MEV-Boost changes for Capella, perhaps you find it useful: https://flashbots.notion.site/MEV-Boost-Capella-Upgrades-00cea01704794f6eb4f792c55b69c441 // still WIP, should be able to wrap things up next week

author: ralexstokes
content: how are you running it? i realize i have zero docs on it

author: ralexstokes
content: (also sorry for delay i was afk this week until today)

author: ralexstokes
content: just from that log i would guess something about the client services is not configured correctly and we are getting an API error there (instead of some valid JSON RPC message we expect)

author: ralexstokes
content: i think the key thing is that you need to run a CL, have it use the builder as the engine endpoint; then configure the builder to use the EL as the engine endpoint "target"
